articles.title: ‘Game 1 is always the hardest’: Patriots veteran shares perspective on Will Campbell’s debut
articles.description:
"It happens," Patriots right-tackle Morgan Moses said of the rookie's rough second half.

The post ‘Game 1 is always the hardest’: Patriots veteran shares perspective on Will Campbell’s debut appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots right-tackle Morgan Moses comments on rookie Will Campbell's challenging debut performance.
Campbell struggled particularly in the second half of the game against the opponent.
Local fans may see increased scrutiny on Campbell's development in upcoming games.

articles.title: Kayshon Boutte reflects on his forgotten history as an elite prospect
articles.description:
Boutte ended up being a sixth-round pick, but his talent once drew comparisons to Stefon Diggs.

The post Kayshon Boutte reflects on his forgotten history as an elite prospect appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kayshon Boutte, once compared to Stefon Diggs, was drafted by the Patriots in the sixth round.
Boutte's elite prospect status raises expectations for his performance in Boston's NFL landscape.
His journey highlights the challenges faced by local athletes in achieving recognition and success.
